name: Doorlock
description: The Doorlock module provides functions for managing door locking states across different doorlock systems. It handles locking and unlocking doors with various access controls.

clientFunctions.name: GetClosestDoor
clientFunctions.description: This will get the closest door to the ped

serverFunctions.name: ToggleDoorLock
serverFunctions.description: Toggles the lock state of a specific door by its ID.

parameters.name: doorID
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the door to toggle

parameters.name: toggle
parameters.description: True to lock the door, false to unlock

returns.description: True if the door state was changed successfully

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Lock a door
local success = Bridge.Doorlock.ToggleDoorLock("police_station_main", true)
if success then
    print("Police station main door locked")
end

-- Unlock a door
Bridge.Doorlock.ToggleDoorLock("hospital_entrance", false)
print("Hospital entrance unlocked")

notes: Door IDs must match those configured in your doorlock system
Lock states persist across server restarts depending on the doorlock system
Some doorlock systems may have additional permission checks
Door locking may be restricted by job, item, or other access controls
Different doorlock systems may have varying door ID formats
Always verify door IDs exist before attempting to toggle lock states
